overview: James Mayfield has spent the last decade performing a one-man show from his youth in an attempt to trigger memories that are very important to him. However, things take a turn when he is pushed into closing his show with a little help from some lost memories. Mayfield has to find the limit of how many times he can relive a moment before his memory changes.
tagline: How Many Times Can You Relive A Memory?
title: Mayfield
